description: Two storey side extension incorporating garage; single storey rear extension; front porch; external alterations including replacement of door with window on side elevation at ground floor level (demolition of attached garage)
decision_conditions: <p>The proposed two storey side extension, by reason of its excessive depth and siting adjoining the boundary with Tudors, Mayfield Drive would give rise to an unduly overbearing, unneighbourly and visually obtrusive form of development which would result in an unacceptable impact on the residential amenities of the occupiers at&nbsp;Tudors, Mayfield Drive.&nbsp; The proposal would therefore be contrary to Policy D3(D.7) of The London Plan (2021),&nbsp;&nbsp;Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013) and the adopted Supplementary Planning Document Residential Design Guide (2010).<br></p>

<p>The proposed&nbsp;two storey side&nbsp;extension&nbsp;by reason of inappropriate design, roof form and lack of set back from the principal elevation would result in&nbsp;cumulative excessive bulk, scale and massing and be a contrived and incongruous extension that would unacceptably harm the character and appearance&nbsp;of the original dwellinghouse,&nbsp;and the visual amenities of the area, contrary to the high quality design aspirations set out in The National Planning Policy Framework (2023), policies D3 (D(1) and D(11)) of The London Plan (2021), Policy CS1.B on the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 of the Development Management Local Plans Policies (2013) and &nbsp;Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010).<br></p>

<p>The proposed front porch by reasons of its inappropriate design and incongruous roof form&nbsp;would result in a obtrusive and unsympathetic appearance&nbsp;that would unacceptably harm the character and appearance&nbsp;of the original dwellinghouse,&nbsp;and the visual amenities of the area, contrary to the high quality design aspirations set out in The National Planning Policy Framework (2023), policies D3 (D(1) and D(11)) of The London Plan (2021), Policy CS1.B on the Harrow Core Strategy (2012), Policy DM1 of the Development Management Local Plans Policies (2013) and &nbsp;Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Design Guide (2010)<br></p>
